info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 9:38PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida...
Little Manatee River At Wimauma at US 301 affecting Hillsborough County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Little Manatee River at Wimauma at US 301.
* WHEN...From Monday evening until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, The canoe rental area floods.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 13.4 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.4 feet on 08/25/1994. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon by 1245 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
